instruction: Your friend is trying to buy a laptop. They are unsure of which features they should prioritize in their purchase. Summarize your advice.
output: When shopping for a laptop, your friend should prioritize factors like battery life, processing power, and RAM size. They should also look into the laptop's display size and resolution, as well as its connectivity options. Ultimately, they should select a laptop that meets their budget and provides them with the performance and features they need.
